column5: High Level Bridge Jn – Newcastle East Jn
column17: R1 Movement of all freight trains (including Engineering and ‘Departmental’ trains) greater than RA5 over High Level Bridge (LEN3/323) must first be authorised by the Infrastructure Manager’s structures engineer or their on-call representative. Locomotive- hauled passenger services are permitted over High Level Bridge (LEN3/323) during perturbed working only. R2 R2- Perturbed working only (in exceptional circumstances only to move / turn vehicles in event of failure) R3 - Single line working only
